original_title: George Clinton and Parliament Funkadelic - Mothership Connection
overview: George Clinton: The Mothership Connection is the title of a DVD released in 1998 and then reissued in 2001, featuring George Clinton and Parliament-Funkadelic. The DVD features a concert performed by Parliament-Funkadelic at the The Summit in Houston, Texas on October 31, 1976. The DVD documents the beginning of famed P-Funk Earth Tour, which would run for almost two years.
title: George Clinton and Parliament Funkadelic - Mothership Connection
